short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your timeline only show tweets from the people you follow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply hides the tweets from users you don't follow.

To temporarily disable, go to chrome://extensions.

Made by @cyrusroshan
Source code at: https://github.com/CyrusRoshan/only-following-tweets
